# Game of Life
Implementation of the [Game of Life](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conways_Spiel_des_Lebens)

## Example:
```
~/Projects/chapter2/12_game_of_life$ python3 game_of_life.py
1000101001
1111111101
1001101100
1000010101
0110010111
1101001000
1001000101
0000100000
1110000010
1000110001
Press enter to display the next generation or (q)uit >

1000100001
0111010101
1001101101
1000001111
0100001111
1110000101
1000000000
0000000000
1100000001
1000100001
Press enter to display the next generation or (q)uit >

1000000001
0011001001
1001011111
1000001010
0000001011
1100000011
0000000000
0000000000
1000000001
1000000001
Press enter to display the next generation or (q)uit >

1000000001
1001000001
1000000111
0000001110
1000000011
1000000011
0000000000
0000000000
1000000001
1000000001
Press enter to display the next generation or (q)uit >
```
